*bold* The teenage-mutant-ninja-turtles project is three things:*bold*

1st) A collection of known attack patterns focused in Web Application input attacks (e.g. SQL Injections, XSS attacks e.t.c)

2nd) A collection of error messages produced by malicious and malformed user inputs. 

3rd) An easy to use python script that helps you to obfuscate payloads for bypassing costume Web Application filters.

It is designed to be used by people with a wide range of security experience and as such is ideal for developers and functional testers who are new to penetration testing as well as being a useful addition to an experienced pen testers arsenal toolkit.
